title: Purdue, Ivy Tech partner on next-generation microelectronics workforce - Purdue University
content: Purdue, Ivy Tech partner on next-generation microelectronics workforce  Purdue University
description: Purdue University and Ivy Tech Community College are partnering to help meet the future workforce needs in microelectronics, a field that is expected to add more than 100,000 workers over the next decade.
